tool_description: This Is An API That Creates A Qrcode image From URL Inputs From The Web Browser. It Offers A Download Option And Saves The Qrcode Image Into The User's Device. The Image, When scanned, Redirects The User To The Respective URL.
name: URL-QRCODE
title: URL-QRCODE

api_list.name: URL-qrcode
api_list.description: This is a QR code generator API for URLs from browsers
